questions.question: What is the dominant color of the displayed towels?

Based on the image, what is the apparent absorbency level of the towels?

What is the general shape of each individual towel when laid flat?
How many towels are visibly present and stacked together in the image?
Considering the weave, what is the apparent density or closeness of the towel's loops?
Does the image show any visible patterns, embroidery, or design elements on the towels?
